message: Hi Bob, given that any delay reduces what I receive while you face no discount, I propose you take the full $100 now. I believe this is fair, as your alternative when you get to propose later is effectively the same outcome.
Let's split it evenly, it's the fairest way to start, considering the inflation factor that affects you more than me.

Hi Bob, thanks for your fair offer. Given that any delay further reduces my share's value, I appreciate that splitting evenly now avoids additional loss. I accept your offer of $50 for me and $50 for you.
